channel.title: CVE Feed for h2o -- quicly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for h2o -- quicly

item.title: CVE-2024-45396|2024-10-11T14:36:38.172Z -- h2o -- quicly
item.description: Quicly is an IETF QUIC protocol implementation. Quicly up to commtit d720707 is susceptible to a denial-of-service attack. A remote attacker can exploit these bugs to trigger an assertion failure that crashes process using quicly. The vulnerability is addressed with commit 2a95896104901589c495bc41460262e64ffcad5c.
